rukus.text: My poslaly Noah do yoho lyudey, kazhuchy, "O moyi lyudy, obozhnyuyut聞 BOHA; vy ne mayete inshoho boha bilya Yoho. YA bo dlya vas retribution awesome dnya
lidery sered yoho lyudey skazaly, "My dyvymos聞 shcho vy daleko astray
Vin skazav, "O moyi lyudy, ya ne astray; YA ye kur'yer z Lorda vsesvitu
ya dostavlyayu do vas povidomlennya moho Lorda, ta ya radyu vam, ta ya znayu z BOHA yaki vy ne znayete

tse nadto bahato zdyvuvannya shcho reminder musyt聞 prybuvayet聞sya do vas z vashoho Lorda, cherez lyudynu lyubyte vas, shchob poperedzhayete vas, ta shchob vedete vas do righteousness, shcho vy mozhete dosyahnuty myloserdya
Vony vidkhylyly yoho. Otzhe, my vryatuvaly yoho ta tsey z nym u ark, ta my potopyly tsi khto vidkhylyly nashi vidkryttya; vony slipi
